name: Bethel A M E Church
description:
The Bethel Food Pantry provides groceries, meat, fruit, and produce to needy households each Friday, helping families to meet their nutritional needs with quality food products, shared without qualification of income or residency. Over 300 households are served each week.

Pantry Enrollment Form given Fridays must Enrollment Cards are sent via US mail via San Francisco Food Bank Shopping

Hours
Friday
11:30am - 1:30pm

BY COLOR CODE TIMES ONLY
On given hours April / May / June
Card Colors
Orange 11: 30 a.m.
Pink 12:00 p.m
Blue 12:30 p.m.
Handicap and Disable Cards begins 11:30 a.m.
